title: "AI Ethics Saying That AI Should Be Especially Deployed When Human Biases Are Aplenty"
excerpt: "AI Ethics urges that we put AI into settings that have been mired in human biases, aiming to remove the bias via replacement by AI, though this turns out to have some twists and turns, as exemplified via AI-based self-driving cars."
